body.p: I write to you to ask you to Parden my Brother I do not believe him guilty if I thought him guilty I could bear the idea of him a Staying theire the full length of his time but he is not guilty if the witnesses against him were respectable I might believe him guilty but they were not my Brother was our Support when he was here we knew no want But but here we are now myself and little Brother and Mother with no one to help us through the coming winter now that my Brother is gone who was duped by two villains, who took advantage of him haveing no Education and led him in to Difaculty I feel confident if he is pardoned that he will be good boy and a great help to his Mother, and me his Sister it is with a Sister and little Brothers prayers I ask you to parden our James
